name: Minekart
description:
This game was made for Historically Accurate Game Jam #6

Jam Page Here!

Description:
Mine resources by clicking on the ore and then ride the cart with it out of the cave while avoiding obstacles. Be careful or you will loose a portion of  your resources. Buy upgrades to get more resources.
Your goal is to buy upgrade "Your dream"

Playtime is roughly 30min

Controls:
Mouse, keyboard and touch. Use your mouse to aim and select buttons and SPACEBAR, mosue buttons or touch to jump.

Created by:

  • Dan Tselish
  • Max Krepchinsky
  • Vladislav Boroday
  • Maxim Pidhorny

Created with Unity3d engine

Resources used:

  • Unity Game Engine by Unity Technologies
  • Mininng sound by Rambow145
  • Moody Tunes - LEGO® Microgame Add-ons by Unity Technologies
  • LeanTween by Dented Pixel
